review: For all purposes this is a pretty good option for content.  However I purchased it so that my wife and I could play some old skool games, (atari and sega type 2 person games-think indy 500, tennis, etc).The Amazon App store is not completely available for content on the Fire TV, so most of those games are not currently able to be played on this device.....bummer!  However of all the games that are available and are multiplayer only a couple are truly multiplayer/splitsceen that you are used to or would expect for a system that boasts about family gaming, the rest are online multiplayer, HUGE LET DOWN!!!!  Looks like I will be sending this little box and 2 controllers back!
author: John
